entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
